description: Comprehensive calendar dataset providing detailed information about dates, including day names, month names, and week numbers, essential for time-based analysis and reporting.

metadata.description: The specific date represented in the dataset, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.
Full descriptive representation of the date, including the day of the week, month, day, and year.
A concise representation of the date, formatted as 'MMM DD, YYYY'.
Full name of the day of the week for each date.
Abbreviated name of the day of the week, represented in three letters.
Full name of the month for the given date.
Abbreviated name of the month; Represents the month in a shortened format (e.g., 'Jan' for January).
The day of the month represented as an integer, indicating the specific day within the calendar.
The week number of the year in which the date falls, indicating the sequential order of weeks.
The position of the day within the week, where 1 represents Sunday and 7 represents Saturday.
The month number of the year when the date falls, ranging from 1 for January to 12 for December.
The quarter of the year in which the date falls, ranging from 1 to 4.
The year of the date, represented as a four-digit integer.
